EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-12-19 VMware ELA.ES 2 - SL 1
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}} Will I see you tomorrow?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4pGAAQ]]> Register Now and Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4pGAAQ]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Getting the data you need to make an informed decision on the terms of your VMware ELA is a challenge, but it doesn't have to be. Attend the How to Optimize Your VMware ELA Webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4pGAAQ]]>to discover how hundreds of VMware customers leverage AI-powered intelligence to ensure an effective purchase.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4pGAAQ]]>
In 30 minutes, you will learn how to negotiate the best deal to optimize your environment while significantly reducing spend. It all takes place this Wednesday at 11 a.m. ET. Register now to save your spot, and we'll enter you to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4pGAAQ]]>. See you there, Andrew P.S. If you can't make it live, download Turbonomic's free trial <[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4hgAAA]]> instead and you'll have access to all the data you need for a successful negotiation in less than one hour.
